definition: a small metal block bearing a raised character on one end, identify as belonging to a certain type
details:
noun
- a small metal block bearing a raised character on one end
- a subdivision of a particular kind of thing
= example: a subdivision of a particular kind of thing
- all of the tokens of the same symbol
= example: all of the tokens of the same symbol
- printed characters
= example: printed characters
- (biology) the taxonomic group whose characteristics are used to define the next higher taxon
- a person of a specified kind (usually with many eccentricities)
= synonyms: case
verb
- identify as belonging to a certain type
= example: identify as belonging to a certain type
= synonyms: typecast
- write by means of a keyboard with types
= example: write by means of a keyboard with types
= synonyms: typewrite
